item.description:
he purpose of this three hour course is to provide a very basic outline of our legal system. It is specifically tailored to people who know very little about our legal system. During the course, we will cover:

• Why this information is necessary
• The hierarchy of constitution, statute, regulation
• The purpose of caselaw
• Phases of trial
• Making your record
• Motions
• Affirmative defenses
• Additional resources, including free ones


Disclaimer: Nothing contained herein or during the course is or should be construed, interpreted or treated as legal advice in any way.
item.name: Crash Course on the Courts: Part One
